site_settings.body_border_color_choice.description: The variable is used in HubSpot's default email templates to determine whether or not a border should be added. The setting is controlled in Content Settings > Colors and Fonts. It prints values: BORDER_AUTOMATIC, BORDER_MANUAL, BORDER_NONE.

site_settings.body_color.description: Body color setting from Content Settings > Colors and Fonts. Prints a HEX value.

site_settings.color_picker_favorite_1.description: Favorite color 1 setting from Content Settings > Colors and Fonts. Prints a HEX value. Replace 1 with 2-6 to modify the tag for other favorite color settings..

site_settings.color_picker_favorite_2.description: Favorite color 2 setting from Content Settings > Colors and Fonts. Prints a HEX value. Replace 2 with 2-6 to modify the tag for other favorite color settings..

site_settings.color_picker_favorite_3.description: Favorite color 3 setting from Content Settings > Colors and Fonts. Prints a HEX value. Replace 3 with 2-6 to modify the tag for other favorite color settings..

site_settings.color_picker_favorite_4.description: Favorite color 4 setting from Content Settings > Colors and Fonts. Prints a HEX value. Replace 4 with 2-6 to modify the tag for other favorite color settings..

site_settings.color_picker_favorite_5.description: Favorite color 5 setting from Content Settings > Colors and Fonts. Prints a HEX value. Replace 5 with 2-6 to modify the tag for other favorite color settings..

site_settings.color_picker_favorite_6.description: Favorite color 6 setting from Content Settings > Colors and Fonts. Prints a HEX value. Replace 6 with 2-6 to modify the tag for other favorite color settings..

site_settings.primary_accent_color.description: Primary accent color setting from Content Settings > Colors and Fonts. Prints a HEX value.

site_settings.primary_font.description: Primary font setting from Content Settings > Colors and Fonts.

site_settings.primary_font_color.description: Primary font color setting from Content Settings > Colors and Fonts. Prints a HEX value.

site_settings.primary_font_size.description: Primary font size setting from Content Settings > Colors and Fonts. Includes 'px'.

site_settings.secondary_accent_color.description: Secondary font color setting from Content Settings > Colors and Fonts. Prints a HEX value.

site_settings.secondary_font.description: Secondary font setting from Content Settings > Colors and Fonts.

site_settings.secondary_font_color.description: Secondary font color setting from Content Settings > Colors and Fonts. Prints a HEX value.

site_settings.secondary_font_size.description: Primary font size setting from Content Settings > Colors and Fonts. Includes
